attributes.action: Ensure all 'personalities' and 'celebrities' hosting 'Children in Need' do so voluntarily.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every year, millions of people sacrifice their time, and effort in aid of this memorable and enjoyable event.  Some of those participating and committing to the show have very little money, particularly the public, but their committment and motivation is outstanding.  

It is sheer cynical greed and a week administtration that has allowed  a certain individual to disgracefully milk the event for his own agrandisement.  It is time it stopped, and, with public petitions such as this it is time he was shamed into doing so.  For him to pocket a fee vastly out of proportion to those who sacrifice so much is obscene.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
